title: The duality of Tahm's character is phenominal

replies.body: Thanks!   Projecting Two-coats dual nature (and linking his kit to personality )  was something the pod was very proud of.
Yea Tahm was extremely well done. When I play Tahm and I get those two stacks on someone, I can almost feel the raging demon inside shouting at me to devour them.

I still think y'all missed potential in him.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sis8y5K3g7k
Wait you mean the one where half the time the guy playing him helps your team and the other half the guy drags your ADC into them?

Character wise he's one of my favorite champs! :D

Dat charming Southern drawl! :P
Or when he eats someone or scuttle crab and screams angrily, "where is it?!/give it to me".  Really wanna know more about that line.

THE RIVER NEVER STOPS!

Probs one of my favorites :)

> [{quoted}](name=NickorizeHD,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1s5WQ8je,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T03:30:31.485+0000)
>
> {{champion:41}} I AM THE REAVER KING

i guess pirate king would be stealing for one piece too much eh? he was know as such before riot made this little edit into "reaver"

but i guess it technically means the same thing.

EVERY RIVER ENDS IN ME

Is my favourite.

I once heard him say it right after I got out of my ult and in my head I imagined a huge spout of water coming out of the ground with him yelling that and then it would fall away showing him with glowing red eyes.
I noticed this too. Nice touch. He gets stacks on someone he just starts charging around mouth first.
I love the Faustian side of him. I've always had a soft spot for that kinda stuff. Spot on Riot, glad there's still some talent here.

I like tahm but there is way too much trolling potential with him, he requires great skill and teamwork to work. Idk maybe with another round of buff he could be competitive but he's like Karma, he seems better in another lane.
No, he is a fat autistic champ. At leas he isn't retard tier like {{champion:432}} .
